trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Bartlett
There were no other sightings in Bartlett on or around February 11th 2010
Summary: A friend and I spotted a craft that had irregular flash patterns and colors (white blue, and all red) very high up.
divs: Sighting Detailsfriend and i looked up saw a light, thought it waws a plane first but then realized the irregular flashing and colors. first 2 or 3 white flashes, the n blue, the would turn and pulsate all red. crossedd the whole sky in minutes, also seemed to be in orbit but very bright for the distance, it flew off into space. not the horizon very high up very amazing, heard a story from a friends coworkers of a similar sighting exactly one week later. in the same area. did not have a good enough camera to capture it but was also witnessed by a friend who was with me.
